translation.en: My Lady, they are upon us.
translation.zh: 公主殿下 他们靠近了

translation.en: The Khan has come. Run for the desert.
translation.zh: 大汗来了 你们逃往大漠吧

translation.en: Lady Kokachin.
You're protected by your blood. They will not harm you.
translation.zh: 您是皇室血脉 他们不会伤害您

translation.en: Harm me? No.
Take me into Kublai's harem? Yes.
translation.zh: 把我送入忽必烈的后宫？ 倒是真的

translation.en: Is it not better than death?
No, Nergüi...
to live under the yoke of a Khan is not better than the Eternal Blue.
translation.zh: 活在可汗的枷锁下 还不如去见长生天

translation.en: Lady Kokachin!
Do we have to attend?
Your absence would be noted.
Khutulun...
that wrestling whore from the west.
translation.zh: 西边那个爱摔跤的婊子

translation.en: Please expel any of your contempt within the confines of these walls, Princess.
translation.zh: 在宫里不要有不敬之语 公主

translation.en: Why is she coming here?
I do not know and it does not matter.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也无所谓

translation.en: You will conduct yourself as you always do...
with graciousness.
You may have more in common than you imagine.
translation.zh: 你们的共同之处 可能比您想象的多

translation.en: That's doubtful.
You lost another trinket.
A bracelet.
It slipped off my wrist as I rode.
translation.zh: 我骑马时从手腕上滑落了

translation.en: A poor decision to wear it on my whip hand.
translation.zh: 我这拿鞭子的手 戴手镯真是不明智

translation.en: Yes, a poor decision.
You take great risk to avoid a greater danger, I understand.
translation.zh: 为了避免更大的危险 你甘冒巨大的风险 我明白

translation.en: In celebration of this New Year...
perhaps you would allow me to eliminate this danger...
translation.zh: 或许您能准许我用手中的剑…

translation.en: with my sword.
I do not.
Father.
An auspicious day for departure. Tsagaan Sar.
translation.zh: 今天是启程的吉日 白月节

translation.en: What you did saved our lives.
I know this.
Your uncle knows, too...
but will not confess it.
I fear...
I will require another New Year to repay the debt I owe.
translation.zh: 来年才能偿还我欠下的债了

translation.en: The Khan will never allow you back into the Imperial City.
translation.zh: 大汗不会再准许你踏入皇城

translation.en: We will meet again.
Rot here, nephew... with your devils.
translation.zh: 带着你的罪恶… 烂在这里吧 侄子

translation.en: We go to the Silk Road to die.
translation.zh: 我们会死在丝绸之路上

translation.en: [Byamba] The brothers Polo have lost their golden tablet.
Yes.
Imperial pass rescinded.
I know.
No lodging, no fresh horses, no vittles.
translation.zh: 没有住宿之地 不能换马匹 没有食物供给

translation.en: -They are vulnerable now to bandits. -Byamba, I know.
translation.zh: -如今还容易遇上劫匪 -宾巴扎布 我知道

translation.en: It's nothing they do not deserve.
translation.zh: 一切都是他们咎由自取

translation.en: [Byamba] We should go.
The Great Khan will be expecting an answer before the White Moon.
translation.zh: 大汗想在白月节前知道答案

translation.en: -We must offer him a head. -We must offer him the right head.
translation.zh: -我们必须为他献上一颗脑袋 -必须奉上罪魁祸首的脑袋

translation.en: [Khutulun] Polo!
Did you come to greet me? I'm touched.
translation.zh: 你是来接我的吗？ 我好感动

translation.en: Did you miss Khutulun?
The sun felt warmer on my face this morning.
translation.zh: 我觉得今早的阳光格外暖和

translation.en: Now I know why.
I'm to present myself to the Great Khan.
Come, witness the pomp.
translation.zh: 走吧 让你开开眼界

translation.en: We are called to duty, Lady.
translation.zh: 我们有皇命在身 公主

translation.en: Come.
Escort me or I will tell the Khan of your disrespect.
translation.zh: 陪我去 否则我告诉大汗 你对我不敬

translation.en: Plans been finalized for the festival?
translation.zh: 白月节的庆典安排好了吗？

translation.en: They have. The games will commence.
translation.zh: 是的 先从比赛开始

translation.en: Good.
The Latin's mission to Kochkor...
translation.zh: 那个拉丁人受命去科奇科尔…

translation.en: I sent him. I would like a report.
translation.zh: 是我派他前去 我想听他回禀

translation.en: Did he return with a discovery?
He and your brother learned as much on their trek
translation.zh: 他和你兄弟此行的结果

translation.en: as Yusuf did flaying the skin off the assassin's bones.
translation.zh: 和玉素甫将那个刺客 剥皮抽筋审出的一样

translation.en: -And that is all? -That is all.
Khutulun awaits your audience.
Hmm. She dressed as a warrior or a lady?
translation.zh: 她今天打扮成勇士还是公主？

translation.en: The former.
I love that girl.
[grunts] No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那姑娘 不用

translation.en: -Are you aggrieved, Jingim? -I am fine, Mother.
translation.zh: -你受委屈了吗 真金？ -没事 母后

translation.en: Then be fine.
Spirits high for our Khan and our kingdom.
translation.zh: 为了大汗和王朝 振作起来

translation.en: Let us find resolution before the White Moon.
translation.zh: 让我们在白月节前 找到解决之道

translation.en: I come here, Khagan...
as emissary for my father, Kaidu of Karakorum.
translation.zh: 是作为我父亲 哈拉和林的海都的使者

translation.en: You are welcome, Khutulun. Rise.
translation.zh: 欢迎你 忽秃伦 平身

translation.en: Sire... we were pained to hear
translation.zh: 陛下…我们很痛心地听闻

translation.en: of the cowardly assault on the Great Khan's person.
It is my father's request and my wish...
translation.zh: 我父亲要求 同时我也希望…

translation.en: that I remain with my horsemen in Cambulac
translation.zh: 能带我的骑手留在元大都

translation.en: as protector of the Great Khan.
Kaidu seeks to ensure your safety.
translation.zh: 海都竭诚希望保护大汗周全

translation.en: I'm your servant.
[Kublai] I have ample protection.
translation.zh: 已有足够的人为朕护驾

translation.en: But I welcome your presence.
I accept your horse, your sword, your spirit.
translation.zh: 朕接受你的马 你的剑 你的忠心

translation.en: You are home.
We're deeply honored, my child.
translation.zh: 我们深感荣幸 孩子

translation.en: I invite you to rest...
then join me and the ladies of the court.
translation.zh: 然后参与我和宫中姐妹的活动

translation.en: I require no rest, Lady Chabi.
translation.zh: 我无需休息 察必皇后

translation.en: Lead and I will follow.
We tour Cambulac
in preparation for the Festival of the White Moon.
You will accompany us.
I am... deeply honored.
A word with you, Blue Princess.
translation.zh: 我有话要说 蓝公主

translation.en: Why did you not listen to me?
Why did you not run from this place?
translation.zh: 你为何不逃离这个地方？

translation.en: I want to know why you ride the grasslands alone at night.
translation.zh: 我想知道你为何 在夜里骑马去草原

translation.en: I want to know who you leave the stones for and why.
translation.zh: 我想知道 你把宝石留给谁 为什么

translation.en: That is none of your concern.
I cannot protect you if you do not talk to me.
translation.zh: 若你不告诉我 我就无法保护你

translation.en: Marco... I planted the serpent.
I did not know it was you.
I fear discovery.
Of what?
Tulga... the man you confronted.
He is a survivor of the Bayaut.
translation.zh: 他是伯岳吾部落的幸存者

translation.en: -He's your subject? -Was.
-Does Za Bing know? -That is why he allows my rides.
translation.zh: -扎炳知道吗？ -这就是他准我出去的原因

translation.en: And abdicates his duty.
I forbid him from handling the gems.
translation.zh: 我不准他插手珠宝的事

translation.en: I will not compromise my friend.
I will carry the gems from now on.
You wish not to compromise your friend?
Imagine what would happen to him should you go missing now.
translation.zh: 设想一下如果你失踪了 他会出什么事？

translation.en: [Jingim] Good New Year to you, brother.
[Byamba] I worry when you call me "brother" instead of "bastard."
translation.zh: 我担心你叫我“兄弟” 而不是“杂种”

translation.en: -It precedes a request. -[Jingim chuckles]
translation.zh: 这种时候你会请我办事

translation.en: I need not request.
I order.
I await your command, Jingim Khan.
translation.zh: 我听候您的命令 真金可汗

translation.en: What news from Eagle's Teaching?
translation.zh: 鹰之巢那边有什么消息？

translation.en: -[sighs] None to speak of. -None...
or none you will speak of?
None.
We're talking about my father.
I will know what danger he faces.
translation.zh: 我得知道他面临怎样的危险

translation.en: [Byamba] Our father.
I share news of danger with him alone.
translation.zh: 有不好的消息 我只告诉他一人

translation.en: I disclose to the Khan.
It is for the Khan to report to the Prince.
That is the order of things.
You want to know about Eagle's Teaching, ask Father, brother.
translation.zh: 你要想知道鹰之巢的事 去问父汗吧 皇兄

translation.en: If you know something... the burden is on you to defend him.
translation.zh: 若你知情…保护他的担子 就落在你肩上了

translation.en: And I will... with my life.
translation.zh: 我会的…我会豁出这条命

translation.en: And if something happens to our father... I will be the one to take it.
translation.zh: 若我们的父汗有不测… 我定要了你的命

translation.en: What did Jingim want of you?
Amends made before the White Moon.
There are no answers here, Byamba, only pain.
translation.zh: 这里没有答案 宾巴扎布 只有痛苦

translation.en: The most important answer may lie within.
translation.zh: 最重要的答案可能就在里面

translation.en: We must confirm it to understand our next steps.
translation.zh: 我们必须确认了 才知道接下来该怎么做

translation.en: [Marco] Sanga's family has lost everything.
Get-- Get--
Stay if you wish.
[speaking English] Can I see your mother?
[Goland speaking English] White devil.
Urla, come! Take the children.
translation.zh: 乌尔拉 过来！ 带弟弟妹妹去玩

translation.en: My condolences.
[Goland] Forty days, Latin.
Forty days is the mourning period.
Too late.
I was away at war.
That was some time ago, Master Polo.
translation.zh: 那是很久以前了 波罗先生

translation.en: Find a better reason for your absence.
translation.zh: 为你不见人影 找个更好的借口吧

translation.en: [Marco] I have none.
Goland, I'm sorry for what happened to Sanga.
translation.zh: 戈兰 桑哥的事我很遗憾

translation.en: More sorry for what I'm about to ask.
translation.zh: 我下面要问的事更是遗憾

translation.en: Did Sanga ever travel to Kochkor?
translation.zh: 桑哥曾去过科奇科尔吗？

translation.en: [Goland] Do you suspect a dead man of another crime?
translation.zh: 你怀疑一个死去的人 还犯过其他罪行吗？

translation.en: You wish to resurrect him, Christian?
translation.zh: 你想让他起死回生 基督徒？

translation.en: Crucify him once more?
[Marco] He stole and he was punished for it.
translation.zh: 他偷东西并因此而受罚

translation.en: I did not sentence him...
and I did not kill him, Goland.
translation.zh: 不是我杀了他 戈兰

translation.en: And my husband did not send himself to Kochkor.
translation.zh: 我丈夫也不是自愿去科奇科尔

translation.en: But he did go?
[Goland] He collected taxes.
Every second fortnight, he rode.
My husband was an honorable man.
Question the man who sent Sanga to Kochkor
before you question that.
translation.zh: 先去质疑 派桑哥去科奇科尔的人

translation.en: Leave us...
please.
[Chabi] We distribute 100,000 loaves of bread every month...
translation.zh: 我们每个月分发十万块馍…

translation.en: goat milk and yak meat when the Great Khan's herds are fat.
translation.zh: 大汗的牲口肥壮时 还发山羊奶和牦牛肉

translation.en: [Khutulun] The people are fortunate for your grace, My Lady.
translation.zh: 您这般仁慈 真是臣民之幸 皇后娘娘

translation.en: [Chabi] We take care of our wards...
and they revere the Khan as their father.
translation.zh: 他们把大汗当父亲一般尊敬

translation.en: Today, they honor us by working tirelessly to prepare for the White Moon festivities.
translation.zh: 今日为准备白月节庆典 他们辛勤劳作 以此表达敬意

translation.en: Something wrong, Blue Princess?
translation.zh: 有何不对吗 蓝公主？

translation.en: I was merely observing the peasants' devotion,
their love for their royal benefactress.
translation.zh: 对皇后娘娘的忠心和敬爱

translation.en: Do you question their devotion and their love?
translation.zh: 你是质疑他们的 忠心和敬爱吗？

translation.en: I do not.
Stop.
Does Lady Kokachin wish to speak on the topic of the common people?
translation.zh: 阔阔真公主是想 谈论百姓的话题？

translation.en: I apologize, Empress, for speaking when not bid to do so.
translation.zh: 请恕罪 皇后娘娘 我未经允许就讲话

translation.en: Do so... now.
Has Her Lady walked the villages of Cambulac without her guard?
translation.zh: 皇后娘娘 是否曾经不带护卫 到过元大都的村庄？

translation.en: I have not.
The Empress' perception of the city is tempered.
translation.zh: 皇后娘娘看到城中景象 比较温和

translation.en: The people love the Khan because he eases their pains, fills their wants...
translation.zh: 臣民们拥护大汗 因为他 为他们消除痛苦 满足所需

translation.en: but the cause of those pains and wants is never permanently stamped out.
translation.zh: 但这些痛苦和需求的源头 从未根除

translation.en: That can breed resentment.
Did you resolve such matters differently when your family held power...
translation.zh: 你的家族掌权时 你可有 不同的办法应对这种问题…

translation.en: Blue Princess of Bayaut?
My relations with our people, Lady Chabi, were somewhat more direct.
translation.zh: 我与臣民的关系 察必皇后 更为直接

translation.en: Is that so?
I mean no offense...
but the Great Khan should know the minds of his people
translation.zh: 但大汗应了解臣民的想法

translation.en: before he walks among them tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明日才好置身于他们之间

translation.en: The Khagan has my sword and my shield.
translation.zh: 大汗有我的剑和遁甲护驾

translation.en: I will meet minds with metal, My Lady.
translation.zh: 我会以武力震慑他们 皇后娘娘

translation.en: The Great Khan is secure.
Is the pain bad today, child?
translation.zh: 今天疼得厉害吗 孩子？

translation.en: The child suffers, Chancellor.
As do we all...
but seeming cruelty can bring beauty.
translation.zh: 但表象上的残忍能带来美丽

translation.en: Pain purifies and leads to peace.
translation.zh: 痛苦得到净化后 就会得到平静

translation.en: These are lessons my sister taught me when I was a boy.
translation.zh: 这是我小时候 从我妹妹身上领悟到的

translation.en: The girl is too old for binding.
translation.zh: 这孩子已过了适合裹足的年纪

translation.en: We would have started at an earlier age were that her father's want.
translation.zh: 若那是他父皇的意愿 我们早就给她裹了

translation.en: The Emperor's gone.
I am her uncle.
It is my want.
'Tis a powerful man who injures little children.
I miss my mother.
We all do, Sunflower...
translation.zh: 我们都想她 太阳花…

translation.en: but I've arranged to speed her journey.
translation.zh: 我已经安排让她快回来了

translation.en: Now... look away, child.
translation.zh: 现在…扭过头去 孩子

translation.en: Are you mad?
Never contact me. You will get us both killed.
translation.zh: 不要联系我 你会害死我们俩的

translation.en: Out. Now.
Why are you here?
Jia Sidao took me into the palace... after you left.
translation.zh: 你走后 贾似道带我进宫

translation.en: He sent me.
He has new orders, Mei Lin.
I am to stay until this mission is complete.
translation.zh: 我会留下 直到完成这个任务

translation.en: Sidao offers this.
Tiger root.
Safe to the touch, but if ingested, it's enough to fell a horse.
translation.zh: 可以碰 但一旦吞咽 足够毒倒一匹马

translation.en: This message says nothing of my daughter.
translation.zh: 他信上只字未提我女儿

translation.en: Speak.
He bound her.
He will do worse if you fail.
translation.zh: 若你失败了 他会变本加厉

translation.en: An assassination?
What he asks of me is impossible.
translation.zh: 他让我做的事不可能办到

translation.en: [Ahmad] What else did you find in Eagle's Teaching...
translation.zh: 你在鹰之巢还有何发现…

translation.en: besides impure gold?
translation.zh: 除了来路不正的金子外？

translation.en: We found evidence that Sanga hired the Hashshashin.
translation.zh: 我们找到证据证明 是桑哥雇的哈萨辛人

translation.en: He didn't choose to go. He was sent.
translation.zh: 他并非自愿去 是有人派他去

translation.en: [Marco] We thought you might offer guidance.
translation.zh: 我们以为你可以 为我们指点迷津

translation.en: Because he worked for me?
translation.zh: 就因为他曾是我的手下？

translation.en: Sanga worked for many.
From Cambulac to...
yes, Kochkor.
The Hashshashin deal in more than death...
translation.zh: 除了做杀手 哈萨辛人还做各种买卖

translation.en: black market trade, silk, coin, salt...
translation.zh: 黑市交易 丝绸 钱币 盐…

translation.en: and currencies I do not countenance.
translation.zh: 还有一些我无法容忍的交易

translation.en: Opium, hashish.
You suspected and did nothing?
translation.zh: 你有所怀疑 却无动于衷？

translation.en: I cannot eliminate corruption... and I will not condemn without proof.
translation.zh: 我无法消除腐败… 我不会无凭无据就定罪

translation.en: If Sanga were running black market goods throughout the realm, he'd need agents...
translation.zh: 如果桑哥在王国内做黑货交易 他需要中间人

translation.en: soldiers, horsemen... imperial guard.
translation.zh: 士兵 骑手 皇宫侍卫

translation.en: You have seen my soldiers.
They toil before the abacus.
I certainly do not command the imperial guard.
translation.zh: 我肯定也无法号令皇宫侍卫

translation.en: That's Vice Regent Yusuf's domain.
translation.zh: 那是副摄政玉素甫的权力范围

translation.en: I simply state fact.
Thank you, Ahmad.
Why did you finally report Sanga?
translation.zh: 你最后为何要检举桑哥？

translation.en: You reported his transgressions to me.
translation.zh: 是你向我禀报他违法的事

translation.en: Had I not, it would have been you or I unjustly trampled in the dirt.
translation.zh: 我若不检举他 在泥地里 被踩死的就会是你我

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] How do preparations for the boy's coronation fare?
translation.zh: 小皇帝的登基大典 准备得如何了？

translation.en: I trust seating arrangements are managed?
translation.zh: 我想站位已安排妥当了？

translation.en: No awkward pairings?
Lord Li cannot tolerate Prelate Chan.
translation.zh: 李大人无法容忍陈祭祀官

translation.en: [Empress Dowager] Leave us, please...
everyone.
The Dynastic Council has chosen to dismiss you, Sidao.
translation.zh: 满朝文武已决定解除 你的宰相之职 似道

translation.en: We appreciate your service to the Emperor...
translation.zh: 我们感谢你对皇帝的忠心

translation.en: but it is time for you to step down.
Have you anything to say?
You have no authority.
You are an old woman with a dead husband and no power.
translation.zh: 你是个老妇人 你夫君已死 你毫无权力

translation.en: You have nothing.
[Empress Dowager] I have a champion.
Do you know Fang Zhen of the Red Lotus Society?
translation.zh: 你认识红莲教的房贞吗？

translation.en: By reputation.
A peasant farmer.
A scholar-warrior of the highest order...
a Song dynasty loyalist... a hero, Sidao.
translation.zh: 是大宋的忠臣…是英雄 似道

translation.en: Because he was poor...
a man of the people.
He is not me.
I shepherded this city, this empire through a time of tumult...
translation.zh: 动乱时期 是我守住了这座城 这个王朝…

translation.en: and that time has not passed.
The Mongols will return.
If they return, they will settle terms of peace...
translation.zh: 他们若回来 那也是来 达成和平协议…

translation.en: and negotiate those terms with him.
translation.zh: 具体条款他们会与他商谈

translation.en: Welcome... to the fortress... Fang Zhen.
Chancellor.
Empress...
I have been too long away.
Take your pets and your porcelain, Sidao...
translation.zh: 带上你的宠物和瓷器 似道

translation.en: and return to the rice paddies.
[speaking English] It is poor form to disturb a man at prayer.
translation.zh: 打断别人祷告真不礼貌

translation.en: [Byamba] We are here on the orders of the Khan, Vice Regent... not your God.
translation.zh: 我们奉大汗之命前来 副摄政…不是你的上帝

translation.en: A serious matter.
We apologize for the disturbance... but the Khan has entrusted us.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰您…但皇命在身

translation.en: Do you remember Sanga, the collector of taxes?
translation.zh: 您是否还记得收税的桑哥？

translation.en: He was executed on your orders.
My father and uncle committed a similar crime.
translation.zh: 我父亲和叔父 也曾犯下相同的罪

translation.en: They were branded.
My Khan favors you, Marco...
thus spared your father and uncle.
translation.zh: 所以饶了你父亲和叔父

translation.en: That was his choice, not mine.
translation.zh: 那是他的选择 不是我的

translation.en: But the Khan had no hand in Sanga's end.
translation.zh: 但大汗并未插手桑哥之事

translation.en: Respectfully, death was your decree.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 是您判他死刑

translation.en: You could have branded his palm, severed his hand, taken an eye.
translation.zh: 您本可以在他手上烙印迹 断他一只手 挖掉他一只眼睛

translation.en: I could do these things to you
for challenging the dictates of the Vice Regent.
translation.zh: 因为你们居然质疑 副摄政的命令

translation.en: We think--
We think Sanga was sent to Eagle's Teaching...
translation.zh: 我们认为 有人派桑哥去鹰之巢…

translation.en: a proxy for a greater power...
translation.zh: 是某个手握重权之人 派他前去…

translation.en: the agent who delivered instructions for the murder of the Khan.
translation.zh: 也就是下令刺杀大汗之人

translation.en: And you suspect Sanga was my proxy?
translation.zh: 你们怀疑桑哥是我派去的？

translation.en: In the absence of the Khan, the Vice Regent would control Cambulac.
translation.zh: 没有了大汗 副摄政就能控制元大都

translation.en: This is true until the Kurultai elected the next Khan of Khans.
translation.zh: 忽里勒台选出下一位 众汗之汗前 此话不假

translation.en: What motive have I, then?
Vice Regent, we do not accuse. We seek advice.
translation.zh: 副摄政 我们并非来兴师问罪 而是征求意见

translation.en: The Great Lord trusts you.
He does, Master Marco.
I am trusted...
because I lack ambition.
I desire no... riches... so I'm incorruptible.
translation.zh: 我不追求…荣华富贵 所以我很清廉

translation.en: I have no blood claim to the throne,
so there is nothing to which I may ascend.
translation.zh: 所以我没有什么可觊觎的

translation.en: I am a servant who has but one function.
translation.zh: 我是个仆役 只有一个用处

translation.en: Which is?
I speak truth.
It is this respect I show my Khan.
My days are driven by this alone.
"How do I best serve Kublai and his kingdom?"
translation.zh: “如何最好地为忽必烈 和他的王朝效命？”

translation.en: There is... clarity in service...
but you... lack this.
Yet here we are.
Yet here we are.
But with what true purpose... does the Khan send you?
translation.zh: 可是大汗派你们来的 真正目的是什么呢？

translation.en: How will you earn his trust?
translation.zh: 你们如何赢得他的信任？

translation.en: Think on that as you take your leave.
Is my father safe?
[Ahmad] Why ask me, Jingim? Did you ask our father?
translation.zh: 为何问我 真金？ 你问过我们的父汗了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] I did.
translation.zh: 为何问我 真金？ 你问过我们的父汗了吗？ 问过了

translation.en: He trusts Byamba.
He trusts the Latin and offers me silence.
translation.zh: 信任那个拉丁人 对我却沉默不语

translation.en: [Ahmad] Whatever they found in Kochkor was of no consequence.
translation.zh: 无论他们在科奇科尔 发现了什么 都毫无结果

translation.en: He doesn't want to burden you with trivialities.
translation.zh: 他不想让你为琐事烦心

translation.en: He doesn't trust me with the truth.
translation.zh: 他不信任我 所以不告诉我真相

translation.en: And what would you do with it, Jingim?
translation.zh: 知道真相你会怎么做 真金？

translation.en: What would you do if you had a target for your rage?
translation.zh: 若你的愤怒有了发泄对象 你会怎么做？

translation.en: I would let my Mongol heart guide me.
translation.zh: 我会听从我这颗蒙古男儿的心

translation.en: I would kill!
The Great Khan knows this.
If there is some truth to hold from you,
he does so because he knows your heart.
translation.zh: 那是因为他了解你的心

translation.en: Let your father protect you.
Let me, your brother, protect you...
translation.zh: 让我 你的兄长 保护你…

translation.en: until we find a true target.
Untrue by an inch.
Untrue by an inch, untrue by a mile.
translation.zh: 差之毫厘 谬以千里

translation.en: It is in the split moment when all four hooves leave the ground.
translation.zh: 四个马蹄离地 只是一刹那的瞬间

translation.en: Breathe and send.
When you first arrived, you had too little yin, too much yang.
translation.zh: 你初来时 阴气不足 阳气过剩

translation.en: And now, too much yin... not enough...
translation.zh: 如今阴气过剩 阳气不足…

translation.en: Not so simple.
Do not strive for the center.
Just breathe... with your horse... and your arrow.
translation.zh: 只管呼吸… 和你的马匹…你的箭

translation.en: The Khan expects an answer.
What answer to give?
The cripple, Yusuf, is beyond reproach.
translation.zh: 玉素甫那个跛子无可指摘

translation.en: Yusuf hides behind his words.
translation.zh: 玉素甫言语间有所隐瞒

translation.en: Is that what you'll report?
translation.zh: 你就要这样禀报大汗吗？

translation.en: Untrue by an inch...
untrue by a mile.
I have no story to tell, Sire.
translation.zh: 我还没找到答案 陛下

translation.en: I believe my friend, Sanga, traveled to Kochkor...
translation.zh: 我相信我的朋友桑哥 去过科奇科尔…

translation.en: but I do not know on whose command... if anyone's.
translation.zh: 但我不知道是受谁指使… 若是幕后主使的话

translation.en: What are your suspicions?
I must say nothing...
for fear that I may condemn an innocent.
All I know... is someone seeks your head.
translation.zh: 我只知道…有人想刺杀您

translation.en: Many do, Latin.
But my children have been spared sight of me far too long.
translation.zh: 但朕的孩子们许久未见朕了

translation.en: Take your leave.
Your children want you alive, Sire.
translation.zh: 您的孩子们希望您活着 陛下

translation.en: Do you still suspect him?
A weaker man would surrender a name to deflect suspicion from himself.
translation.zh: 弱者会用他人的名字 来打消自己的嫌疑

translation.en: As would a man burdened with guilt.
translation.zh: 身负重罪之人也会如此

translation.en: I believe him to be neither.
The boy has changed greatly since coming to us.
translation.zh: 归顺我们后 这孩子改变很大

translation.en: He did not come to us, Sire. He was left...
translation.zh: 他没有归顺 陛下 他是被人抛弃…

translation.en: A fact that bears recall.
You suspect the Latin's father?
Did he abandon his son to serve his purse... or his pope?
translation.zh: 他抛弃自己的儿子 是为了钱…还是为了教皇？

translation.en: So, what course of action tomorrow?
We have detained and questioned your guards and staff.
translation.zh: 我们已收押并审问 您的侍卫和手下

translation.en: I believe them innocent.
My suspicion of Marco has waned...
translation.zh: 我对马可的怀疑也已消除…

translation.en: but for now, to be safe... those whom lack your trust... kill.
translation.zh: 但如今为了安全起见… 您不信任的人 还是杀了吧

translation.en: There would be few left living if I heed that counsel.
translation.zh: 我若采纳你这条建议 那能活的就寥寥无几了

translation.en: Should I trust you, Yusuf?
translation.zh: 我该信任你吗 玉素甫？

translation.en: We will play another time.
[Khutulun] Where's your European playmate?
He's an innocent in this world, isn't he?
translation.zh: 他是这世上的 清白之人 是吗？

translation.en: And you and I are not?
No... we are warriors.
I fear our world strips him of what innocence still remains.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们这世道 会让他的清白荡然无存

translation.en: Then we do him a favor.
The world is not kind to the weak and the guileless.
translation.zh: 这世道 弱者和老实人 可没有好下场

translation.en: Would you like to wrestle me?
There are no witnesses, save Tengri.
translation.zh: 没有旁人 除了腾格里天神

translation.en: Do you think you can beat me?
I think you wish me to.
Not today.
Are you afraid?
I simply hear the blade's song right now.
translation.zh: 此时我只听到剑刃在欢歌

translation.en: Where you go?
Where are you going?
Come.
If it pleases the Khan.
If it pleases the Queen. Hmm?
[whispers] It does not please the Queen.
[Ahmad] Pitiable event on this blessed day of Tsagaan Sar.
translation.zh: 白月节这样的喜庆之日 居然发生这等憾事

translation.en: It seems life has left her too soon.
The Khan's consorts must not cry.
It clouds the eyes and ruddies the complexion.
translation.zh: 哭泣会令你们双眼朦胧 面色发红

translation.en: Death is life.
Now is not the time for tears.
[Fang Zhen] Will you return to your village, Chancellor?
translation.zh: 您会回乡吗 宰相大人？

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I was too grand for it when I was part of it.
translation.zh: 在家乡时 我便觉得那里的天地太小

translation.en: I've grown grander since.
I have been an admirer of yours... from afar... from the battlefield.
translation.zh: 我一直仰慕您… 远远的…在战场上

translation.en: You have been an annoying thorn in Kublai's side for many years, Fang Zhen,
translation.zh: 多年来你一直是 忽必烈的眼中钉 房贞

translation.en: frightening his tax collectors, burning his crops,
translation.zh: 令他的收税官闻风丧胆 火烧他的庄稼

translation.en: storing weapons in loyalist settlements,
translation.zh: 在拥护大宋的地方招兵买马

translation.en: settlements that bear the brunt of the Khan's brutality
translation.zh: 你离开后 蒙古大汗的残暴怒火

translation.en: after you've moved on.
I've long admired you as well.
I tire of warfare.
Before or after Empress Dowager offered you my title?
translation.zh: 在太皇太后把我的位置 让给你之前还是之后？

translation.en: War is pointless. It never ends.
translation.zh: 战争无意义 永无休止

translation.en: Yes... the warrior who rejects war.
translation.zh: 是的…拒绝战争的勇士这样看

translation.en: Empress is more intelligent than I suspected.
translation.zh: 太皇太后比我想象中聪明

translation.en: You... more foolish.
We are like-minded, Chancellor... in our need to defend Xiangyang.
translation.zh: 对于守护襄阳 宰相大人 我们志同道合

translation.en: I will do so until my final breath.
Peace is possible...
and it begins, Jia Sidao... with our peaceful transition.
translation.zh: 会随着我们之间的和平交接 而开始 贾似道

translation.en: Is it time?
It is, Father...
but I did not advise your attendance.
What can be done has been done, Jingim.
translation.zh: 要出事早出了 真金

translation.en: You worry like your mother.
Vice Regent Yusuf himself concurs with me.
translation.zh: 副摄政玉素甫也是这个意思

translation.en: Yusuf is worse than your mother.
translation.zh: 玉素甫比你母后还忧心

translation.en: We do not yet know who conspired against Your Greatness.
translation.zh: 我们还未查出是谁 与人合谋行刺您

translation.en: Rumor breeds fear.
My people do not know if blood courses through my veins...
translation.zh: 朕的臣民还不知 朕是尚在人间…

translation.en: or if my body rests with Genghis in Burkhan Khaldun.
translation.zh: 还是与成吉思汗一起 长眠于不儿罕合勒敦山了

translation.en: I must show them their Khan.
translation.zh: 朕必须让臣民看到他们的大汗

translation.en: You are concerned you are seen as weak.
I cannot afford to bolster these perceptions.
translation.zh: 我不能给臣民这样的印象

translation.en: There is no question, Father.
You slayed Ariq single-handedly.
Why was that necessary?
Why did my brother challenge me?
translation.zh: 为何朕的兄弟要挑战朕？

translation.en: He saw me as weak.
Despite what I did... people still...
translation.zh: 无论朕有何作为… 臣民依然…

translation.en: rumor of my decline...
and they worry for succession.
-The line is clear. -But not guaranteed, Jingim.
translation.zh: -谁来继承显而易见 -但并非万无一失 真金

translation.en: You will be opposed at the Kurultai when the time comes.
translation.zh: 真到那一天 忽里勒台会有人反对你

translation.en: Kaidu... Nayan...
many feel entitled to my throne.
translation.zh: 很多人自认为有继任权

translation.en: The throne is mine and I will ascend to it.
translation.zh: 皇位是我的 我一定能继位

translation.en: There is nothing I desire more than this.
But you fear I will fail.
You must prove yourself to the Khanate.
translation.zh: 你必须向汗国证明自己

translation.en: Until you do... until you silence all doubters...
translation.zh: 在那之前… 在所有质疑者无话可说之前

translation.en: I must be strong.
And so today... you risk yourself?
I fulfill my duty.
Rally my people.
To inspire your strength.
Am I such a burden?
translation.zh: 我竟是这样一个负担吗？

translation.en: You're my son.
Tulga...
I spoke to Kokachin.
translation.zh: 我去找过阔阔真公主了

translation.en: I did not come to hurt you. I came to help you.
translation.zh: 我来不是要害你 我是来帮你的

translation.en: You lie.
I know who you are.
One of the Bayaut... a survivor of the massacre.
translation.zh: 伯岳吾部落…大屠杀的幸存者

translation.en: I know she protects you.
I protect her.
No more.
If I found you, someone else will find you.
translation.zh: 我找到你了 别人也会找到你

translation.en: It will be your undoing and hers.
translation.zh: 到时候你和她都死定了

translation.en: You risk the Princess.
The Princess is all I have.
You love her.
There was an arrangement... long ago.
We are to be together.
I will bring you the stones. You will not see Kokachin.
translation.zh: 我会带宝石来给你 你不能见阔阔真公主

translation.en: But you will live.
[Jingim] All bow down and worship at once your Lord.
God save and keep our Lord long with joy and gladness.
translation.zh: 天佑大汗万寿无疆 喜乐常伴

translation.en: Long live the Khan of Khans!
Urla.
No line up for water on the night of the White Moon.
translation.zh: 白月节没人来排队打水

translation.en: I'm sorry for what happened to your father.
As you said, you did not sentence him...
translation.zh: 正如你说的 不是你给他判刑…

translation.en: and if he was a thief, he was deserving of punishment.
translation.zh: 若他真的偷窃 那就是罪有应得

translation.en: Sanga was a good man.
What do you think he did?
What was it Ahmad sent him to do?
I cannot answer that.
Never again breathe that suspicion.
For your family's sake... never.
Move on.
Help your family to find a future without him.
translation.zh: 他不在了 你带着家人好好过日子

translation.en: The bracelet is delivered.
I am most grateful.
I will repay your gesture in the future.
You can repay it now... with the answer to a question.
translation.zh: 你现在你可以报答… 回答我一个问题

translation.en: How is it that a peasant weds a princess?
translation.zh: 一介农夫怎么能娶公主？

translation.en: No royal marries beneath their station.
translation.zh: 皇室中人不会 与地位低下者结亲

translation.en: Then Tulga is delusional?
translation.zh: 那图尔加是痴心妄想了？

translation.en: I could not be with Tulga, Master Marco, any more than I could be with you.
translation.zh: 我不能与图尔加在一起 马可先生 也不能与你在一起

translation.en: You avoid a direct answer to my question, Blue Princess.
translation.zh: 你答非所问 蓝公主

translation.en: Silence is no shield, Kokachin.
translation.zh: 沉默可不是挡箭牌 阔阔真公主

translation.en: If you expect me to deliver the gems to your subject,
translation.zh: 若你还想让我送珠宝 给你的臣民

translation.en: I need to know if that subject is mad.
translation.zh: 我得知道那个臣民 是否疯癫了

translation.en: He is not.
Then there are nuptials to be arranged.
translation.zh: 那就是说你们确实有婚约

translation.en: Is the Khan aware?
You lack humor, Latin.
translation.zh: 你真不幽默 拉丁人

translation.en: I intend none.
I am deceived.
It is time for Jingim to take a new wife, I think.
translation.zh: 真金该新娶一房亲了 我认为

translation.en: A more fertile bitch, I hope.
-The rest are barren as my Gobi. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 他那几房像我的戈壁一样 荒芜贫瘠

translation.en: I trust you have someone in mind?
Stop!
